main event: A civilian observed a silver-white circular object moving in the southeast direction for approximately 1.5 minutes on July 4, 1955.
interesting points: The object had a straight up-and-down motion and displayed bright, flashing red and blue lights., The sighting occurred during bright daylight., The object was observed to be very plane-like and departed quickly., The witness's father also saw the same object on the same day., The estimated speed of the object was 200-300 miles per hour.
witness description: A 28-year-old female who reported the sighting and her father confirmed seeing the same object.
